definitions.body: :Ge 40:5 night (NH id.; MI:15 [[ללה]]([[ב]]); Aram. [[לֵילָא]], lilyo0, lelyo0; Ar. laylun, laylah;un; Eth. lelit: all = night; As. lîlâtu, evening Dl:HWB; meaning of √ dubious; form probably [[לילי]], and ending [[ה]]—[[ָ]] radical, and not [[ה]] loc., Nö:M 127 Dl:Prol. 128 Ges:§ 90:2. c. R. Kö:ii. p. 57, R. 1);—abs. [[לַ֫יְלָה]] Ge 19:33 + 214 t. + 2 t. Qr. (v. infr.); [[לָָיְלָה]] Ge 1:5 + 3 t.; [[לַ֫יִל]] Is 16:3 + Pr 31:18, La 2:19 Kt (Qr [[לַיְלָה]]); [[לֵיל]] Is 15:1, Is 15:1, Is 21:1; cstr. [[לֵיל]] Ex 12:42, Is 30:29; pl. abs. [[לֵילוֹת]] 1Sa 30:12 + 4 t.; cstr. id., Is 21:8 + 5 t.;—

lit. night, opp. day, Ge 8:22 (J), De 1:33 + very oft. (v. [[יוֹם]]); alternation of day and night divinely ordained Ge 1:5 (P), Je 33:20, Je 33:20, Je 33:25 +; ´[[מִיּוֹם עַד־ל]] Is 38:12, Is 38:18 i.e within one whole day; as close of day, ´[[עַד־ל]] 2Ch 35:14; as time of sacred [[חָג]] ([[לֵיל]]) Is 30:29; of suffering and weeping [[לֵילוֹת עָמָל]] Job 7:3, cf. Ps 6:7, Ps 77:3 etc.; of pious desires, prayer, praise, meditation, etc (sts. ‖ by day) Is 26:9, Job 35:10, Ps 1:2, Ps 22:3, Ps 42:9, Ps 77:7, Ps 88:2, Ps 92:3, Ps 119:5, Ps 119:5, cf. Ps 16:7, Ps 17:8; of night-service in Temple Ps 134:1; of sudden assault, or destruction, Is 15:1, Je 6:5, Ob:Ob 5, Job 27:20, Job 34:20, Job 34:25, Job 36:20; divided into watches Ps 90:4; [[לֵיל שִׁמֻּרִים]] Ex 12:42 v. sub [[שׁמר]]; c. num., denoting duration of time, †forty days and forty nights Ge 7:4, Ge 7:12, Ex 24:18, Ex 34:28, De 9:9, De 9:11, De 9:18, De 9:25, De 10:10, 1Ki 19:8; three days and three nights ([[שְׁלשָׁה לֵילוֹת]]) 1Sa 30:12, Jon 2:1; seven days and seven nights ([[שִׁבְעַת לֵילוֹת]]) Job 2:13 †; ´[[חֲלוֹם הַלּ]] † Ge 20:3, Ge 31:24 (both E), 1Ki 3:5; ´[[מַרְאׂת הַלּ]] Ge 46:2 (E); ´[[חֶזְיוֹן ל]] Job 20:8, Job 33:15, ´[[חֶזְיׁנוֹת ל]] Job 4:13, ´[[חֲלוֹם חֲזוֹן ל]] Is 29:7 (cf. Mic 3:6 infr.) †; ´[[בִּן־ל]] Jon 4:10, Jon 4:10 v. [[בֵּן]]

p. 121 b. Chiefly in adverb. phr.:—´[[בַּחֲחִי הַלּ]] at midnight Ex 12:29 + (v. [[חֲחִי]], [[חָחוֹת]] p. 345 b), cf. ´[[בְּתוֹח הַלּ]] † 1Ki 3:20, ´[[בְּאִישׁוֹן ל]] Pr 7:9 †; [[הַזֶּה]] ´[[בַּלּ]] Ex 12:8, Ex 12:12 on this night (P; the night of which one is speaking); [[הַהוּא]] ´[[בַּלּ]] on that night Ge 19:35 (J) + oft., (P only Nu 14:1); [[הוּא]] ´[[בַּל]] Ge 19:33, Ge 30:16; so ´[[הַלּ]] alone † 1Sa 14:34, but del. LXX We Kit, cf. Dr; Klo Bu rd. [[ליהוה]]; ´[[הַלּ]] to-night † Ge 19:5, Ge 19:34, Ge 30:15 (all J), Nu 22:8, Nu 22:19 (E), Jos 2:2, Jos 4:3 (both JE), 2Sa 17:1, 2Sa 17:16, 2Sa 19:8, Ru 1:12, Ru 3:2, Ru 3:13, opp. [[מָחָר]] tomorrow 1Sa 19:11; ´[[הַלּ]] = this night just past, last night 1Sa 15:16 (cf. Dr); ´[[כָּל־הַלּ]] all night Ho 7:6 (opp. [[בּׂקֶר]]), Ex 14:20, Ex 14:21 (J), Nu 11:32, Jos 10:9 (both JE), Ju Jdg 16:2, Jdg 16:2, Jdg 19:25, 1Sa 15:11, 1Sa 31:12, 2Sa 2:29, 2Sa 2:32, 2Sa 4:7; opp. [[כל־היום ההוא]] (of continuous action) 1Sa 19:24, 1Sa 28:20, Is 62:6, opp. [[יומם]] Ps 78:14; ´[[בְּכָל־ל]] Ps 6:7 every night (prob.); cf. [[כָּל־הַלֵּילוֹת]] Is 21:8 all the nights (opp. [[יוֹמָם]]) †; esp. [[לַיְלָה]] by night Nu 22:20 (E) Jos 8:3 (JE), De 16:1, Nu 9:16 (P) + 51 t.; of these Ge 14:15 and Ex 13:21, Ex 13:22 (J) + 25 t. opp. [[יוֹמָם]], covering all the time; otherwise Ju Jdg 6:27 (opp. [[יוֹמָם]]); [[לַיְלָה וׇיוֹם]] night and day 1Ki 8:29, Is 27:3, Es 4:16; less oft. [[לֵילוֹת]] Ps 16:17; ´[[הַלּ]] by night † 2Ki 25:4 (´[[ל]] in ‖ Je 52:7), Zec 1:8, Ne 4:16 (opp. [[הַיּוֹם]] ) †; ´[[בַּלּ]] id., Je 6:5 + 18 t. (chfly late; oft. opp. [[בַּיּוֹם]], [[יוֹמָם]], etc.); [[בַּלֵּילוֹת]] † Ps 92:3 (opp. [[בַּבּׂקֶר]], Ps 134:1 Ct So 3:1, So 3:8; [[בְּלַיְלָה]] Ne 9:19 (opp. [[בְּיוֹמָם]] ); [[בְּלֵיל]] Is 15:1, Is 15:1 ´[[כַּל]] as at night Job 5:14 (opp. [[חָהֳרָָיִם]] )†.

fig. [[שִׁיתִי כַּלַיִל חִלֵּח]] Is 16:8 sim. of shadow of Zion as protection; more oft. in gloomy sense, of avenging calamity without divine guidance or comfort [[לַיְלָה מֵחָזוֹן]] Mic 3:6; personal distress Job 35:10; judgment perh. also Job 36:20 (Ew De Di Da; night of death Bu; ‘ unintelligible ’ Siegf); [[מַה־מִּלַּיְלָה מַה־מִּלֵּיל]] Is 21:11 i.e. what hour of the night of calamity is it? cf. v:Is 21:12 (opp. [[בּׂקֶר]]).
